text: Andy Samberg is the new King of Pop in the first red band trailer for “ Popstar : Never Stop Never Stopping. ” In the film, Samberg plays hit musician Conner4Real, who faces a crisis of popularity after his sophomore album flops. His fans begin to then wonder if Conner is really as dope as he ’ s made himself out to be. The mockumentary features an all - star comedy lineup that includes Sarah Silverman, Tim Meadows, Bill Hader and Maya Rudolph. In addition, celebrities like Usher, Simon Cowell, and Snoop Dogg will make cameos.
